NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Real estate services with own property
Renting or leasing services of own property
Real estate agency services on a fee or contract basis

CODIF_DATA.TY_TYPE_BID: Submission for one or more lots

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: Virksomhed i forbindelse med fast ejendom

CA_CE_CONCESSIONAIRE_PROFILE.ADDRESS: Northumbrian Water Limited, Boldon House, Wheatlands Way, Pity Me, Durham. DH1 5FA

LOCATION.P: This work could be carried out under any of the Northumbrian water and Essex and Suffolk Water operating areas - The North East of England, Essex and Suffolk.
— Lot 1 - Planning Services for Northumbrian Water Operating Area, and,
— Lot 2 Estate Management Services for Essex and Suffolk Water Operating Area.

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: The contracting entity wishes to establish a framework agreement for the provision of Estate Management Services.
The work required under the framework will be split into two Lots:
— Lot 1 - Specialist Planning Services for Northumbrian Water Operating Area.
— Lot 2 - Estate Management Services covering the Essex and Suffolk Operating Area.
Please see the additional information in section VI.3 to find out how to express an interest.

F05_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: NW1928 Specialist Planning Services for Northumbrian Water Operating Area - Lot 1

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: NWG are looking for expressions of interest for a supplier of specialist planning services for their Northumbrian Water Operating Area in the North East of England.
NOTE: NWG has an in-house team delivering estate management services in their Northumbrian Water Operating area so this lot is looking for a specialist planning consultancy.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: Lot 1 - Specialist Planning Consultancy for Northumbrian Water Operating Area.
The services required under this lot include but is not limited to:

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ABOUT_LOTS.P: It is the intention to appoint one or a maximum of two suppliers to this Lot.
No work is guaranteed under this framework. All figures provided above in section 3 of Annex B are based on the initial 3 years and are estimates and should not be relied upon.

F05_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: NW1928 Estate Management Services for Essex and Suffolk Water Operating Area - Lot 2

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: NWG are looking for expressions of interest for a supplier of Estate Management Services for their Essex and Suffolk Operating Area in the South East of England.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: Lot 2 - Estate Management Services for the Essex and Suffolk Water Operating Area.
These works include but is not limited to:
— to manage the Company’s property portfolio in the Essex and Suffolk operating area in accordance with the Company’s property policy to be provided,
— this will include the agricultural, commercial, residential and miscellaneous estate,
— — servicing and negotiating schedules of dilapidations,
— — liaising with the companies maintenance framework provider to undertake property repair and refurbs,
— — provision of a point of contact for tenants to report repairs and issues,
— — undertake valuations including those in accordance with the RICS Valuation - Professional Standards (the ‘Red Book’) and for tax purposes,
— — freehold and leasehold acquisitions, property disposal management and professional advice and reports as required.
Capital Projects and Operational Property Services:

— to provide property services to the Company’s Operational works programme, to include advice on route or site selection, referencing prior to a pipeline or other works, provision of schedules of condition (if necessary), negotiations with owners and occupiers before, during and after any works, the acquisition of land or interests in land, negotiation of compensation claims, the servicing of statutory notices for pipelines and other works and work associated with a CPO. — also, to provide advice on land and property issues.
There is also the optional requirement relating to screening new development planning applications in the ESW region.

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ABOUT_LOTS.P: It is envisaged to appoint a maximum of 1 supplier to this lot.
No work is guaranteed under this framework. All figures provided in Section 3 of Annex B are based on the initial three-year duration and are estimates and should not be relied upon.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: NWG are looking for expressions of interest to join our framework for Estates Management Services.
The requirement will be split into two lots:
1) Lot 1: Specialist Planning Services covering the Northumbrian Water Operating Area.
The services required under this lot include but is not limited to:
NOTE: In the Northumbrian Water operating area, NWL has an in-house estates team delivering estate management services and as such only require a specialist planning consultant.
2) Lot 2: Estate Management Services covering the Essex and Suffolk Operating Area.
The services under this lot include but are not limited to:

— to manage the Company’s property portfolio in the Essex and Suffolk operating area in accordance with the Company’s property policy to be provided. This will include the argricultural, commercial, residential and miscellaneous estate,
— — servicing and negotiating schedules of dilapidations,
— — liaising with the companies maintenance framework provider to undertake property repair and refurbs,
— — provision of a point of contact for tenants to report repairs and issues,
— — undertake valuations including those in accordance with the RICS Valuation - Professional Standards (the ‘Red Book’) and for tax purposes,
— — property disposal management and professional advice and reports as required.
Capital Projects and Operational Property Services:
— to provide property services to the Company’s Operational works programme, to include:
— — advice on route or site selection,
— — referencing prior to a pipeline or other works,
— — provision of schedules of condition (if necessary),
— — negotiations with owners and occupiers before,
— — the acquisition of land or interests in land,
— — the servicing of statutory notices for pipelines and other works and work associated with a CPO.
Also, to provide advice on land and property issues.
There is also the optional requirement relating to screening new development planning applications in the ESW region.
Please see the additional information in section VI.3 to find out how to express an interest.

OPTION_DESCRIPTION.P: The duration of the framework is 3 years with the option to extend for a further 2 years dependant on business needs, markets and performance and will be subject to regular reviews. The contracting entity reserves the option to remove permanently or suspend any contractor at any time who falls below acceptable standards of performance in any respect.

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Performance Bonds, Parent Company Guarantees or other forms of appropriate security may be required. This will be advised if invited to tender.

MAIN_FINANCING_CONDITIONS.P: This will be advised if invited to tender

LEGAL_FORM.P: Joint and several liability agreement under English Law with designated lead entity

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: These will be set out in the Prequalification documentation

F05_ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_CAPACITY.P: These will be set out in the Prequalification documentation

TECHNICAL_CAPACITY.P: These will be set out in the Prequalification documentation

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION.P: Applicants are asked to note that this procurement process will be conducted electronically with all documents and communication being managed through the Northumbrian Water e sourcing spend management portal hosted by Ariba.

Expression of interest must be sent to the email address amp6nim@nwl.co.uk before the deadline date of the 20.2.2018 at 16:00. Once you express an interest you will be added to the Ariba tender portal and you will receive an email from Ariba with a link to access the pre-qualification documents.
The deadline for completing the PQQ is the 27.2.2018 at 16:00.
When sending your expression of interest, applicants must provide the following information:
2) Main contact details of the person to be given access to the Ariba portal - name, job title, email address, telephone number;
3)Lot(s) you are interested in (Northumbrian Water Operating Area or Essex and Suffolk Operating Area or Both);
